meanings.definition: A hard, white, translucent ceramic material
meanings.sent1: The delicate porcelain vase gleamed on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the porcelain teacup on the saucer.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy magician tried to juggle porcelain plates.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was as smooth and flawless as porcelain.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the porcelain bell echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: Objects made from this material, especially tableware and decorative items
meanings.sent1: The elegant dining set included fine porcelain dishes.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop displayed a collection of delicate porcelain figurines.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the porcelain figurines.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as fragile as porcelain in that moment.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the porcelain bowl mesmerized her.
